Getting Started
===============

This :doc:`getting-started` guide is intended to assist the user with installing the library.


Install from PyPI
-----------------

The latest released version of :obj:`paguro` can be installed from `PyPI <https://pypi.org/project/paguro/>`_ using `pip`.

.. code-block:: console

   $ pip install paguro

`Paguro has only 1 required dependency: polars`

Import
------

Import the :obj:`paguro` package in Python.

.. ipython:: python

   import paguro as pg
   pg.__version__
